10
11#ifndef MODULES_RTP_RTCP_INCLUDE_RECEIVE_STATISTICS_H_
12#define MODULES_RTP_RTCP_INCLUDE_RECEIVE_STATISTICS_H_
13
14#include <map>
15#include <memory>
16#include <vector>
17
18#include "absl/types/optional.h"
19#include "call/rtp_packet_sink_interface.h"
20#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/include/rtcp_statistics.h"
21#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/include/rtp_rtcp_defines.h"
22#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/source/rtcp_packet/report_block.h"
23
24namespace webrtc {
25
26class Clock;
27
28class ReceiveStatisticsProvider {
29 public:
30 virtual ~ReceiveStatisticsProvider() = default;
31 // Collects receive statistic in a form of rtcp report blocks.
32 // Returns at most |max_blocks| report blocks.
33 virtual std::vector<rtcp::ReportBlock> RtcpReportBlocks(
34 size_t max_blocks) = 0;
35};
36
37class StreamStatistician {
38 public:
39 virtual ~StreamStatistician();
40
41 virtual RtpReceiveStats GetStats() const = 0;
42
43 // Returns average over the stream life time.
44 virtual absl::optional<int> GetFractionLostInPercent() const = 0;
45
46 // TODO(nisse): Delete, migrate users to the above the GetStats method.
47 // Gets received stream data counters (includes reset counter values).
48 virtual StreamDataCounters GetReceiveStreamDataCounters() const = 0;
49
50 virtual uint32_t BitrateReceived() const = 0;
51};
52
53class ReceiveStatistics : public ReceiveStatisticsProvider,
54 public RtpPacketSinkInterface {
55 public:
56 ~ReceiveStatistics() override = default;
57
58 // Returns a thread-safe instance of ReceiveStatistics.
59 // https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/lkgr/docs/threading_and_tasks.md#threading-lexicon
60 static std::unique_ptr<ReceiveStatistics> Create(Clock* clock);
61 // Returns a thread-compatible instance of ReceiveStatistics.
62 static std::unique_ptr<ReceiveStatistics> CreateThreadCompatible(
63 Clock* clock);
64
65 // Returns a pointer to the statistician of an ssrc.
66 virtual StreamStatistician* GetStatistician(uint32_t ssrc) const = 0;
67
68 // TODO(bugs.webrtc.org/10669): Deprecated, delete as soon as downstream
69 // projects are updated. This method sets the max reordering threshold of all
70 // current and future streams.
71 virtual void SetMaxReorderingThreshold(int max_reordering_threshold) = 0;
72
73 // Sets the max reordering threshold in number of packets.
74 virtual void SetMaxReorderingThreshold(uint32_t ssrc,
75 int max_reordering_threshold) = 0;
76 // Detect retransmissions, enabling updates of the retransmitted counters. The
77 // default is false.
78 virtual void EnableRetransmitDetection(uint32_t ssrc, bool enable) = 0;
79};
80
81} // namespace webrtc
82#endif // MODULES_RTP_RTCP_INCLUDE_RECEIVE_STATISTICS_H_
83
